page.title: 04Other landowners SW.Cheshire
page.content: Beside the Grosvenor Estate the other main landowners in the area appear small even though they too farm & rent out land & houses eg. Coldharbour Farm is rented from a Major Collier.The family of Lord Woolley owns land around Hatton House & Hatton Hall, whilst Hatton farm & the 18 acres of Milners Heath farm are owned by another family & operated as one unit.Some of the houses are owner- occupied eg.some renovated cottages on Long Lane which retain some of their original character & in Gatesheath is a row of smart 1960's detached houses with garages but here also is a small estate of semi-detached council houses owned by Chester City,all with the same colour paint & a separate garage block.It is noticeable that people off the Grosvenor Estate will more readily give information about themselves.
